name: Immersit
description:
A YNFG Fangame made initially for Dream Diary Jam 5 using RPG Maker 2003.

Features:

-- A(n as of now small) dreamscape that has quite a bit of water in it.

-- -> 6 nexus worlds as well as a few deeper ones

-- A few effects to find throughout

-- Lots of open ends that are to be dealt with in future versions
